        public java.util.Vector<SQLkey> getCoursesFromEstab(int estab,
                                           DateFr startDate,
                                           CourseModuleInfo courseInfo)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets a list of courses(id, title) scheduled from startDate in estab. Depending course's code, schedule's type and length may be used to filter the results.
        Parameters:
        estab - estab id
        startDate - from date
        courseInfo - course module info
        Returns:
        a list of (id,title)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
